Package net.chwthewke.hamcrest.annotations

This package contains the annotations used to declare equivalence specifications, which are interfaces annotated with EquivalenceSpecificationOn.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
ApproximateEquality The ApproximateEquality annotation specifies equivalence as differing by less than its ApproximateEquality.tolerance() property.
BySpecification The BySpecification annotation specifies equivalence as defined by a specification interface appropriate to the annotated property's type.
Equality The Equality annotation specifies equivalence as the result of calling Object.equals(Object).
EquivalenceSpecificationOn The EquivalenceSpecificationOn annotation declares that the annotated type (which must be a public interface) is an equivalence specification for the type returned by EquivalenceSpecificationOn.value() (henceforth called matched type).
Identity The Identity annotation specifies equivalence as reference equality (==).
NotPublic Used with an equivalence annotation, NotPublic declares that the annotated method should be used for equivalence even though it is not public, but merely visible, on the matched type.
 

Package net.chwthewke.hamcrest.annotations Description

This package contains the annotations used to declare equivalence specifications, which are interfaces annotated with EquivalenceSpecificationOn.

See Also:
for more details on equivalence specification
